typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Project ID} as string,
		Context as string,
		{Type of event} as string,
		{Type of Participant} as string,
		Status as string,
		{Registration Date} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> source1
source1 derive(Email = 'NULL') ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		{Project ID} as string,
		Context as string,
		{Type of event} as string,
		{Type of Participant} as string,
		Status as string,
		Email as string,
		{Registration Date} as timestamp,
		{Account Activated} as string,
		{Submission Date} as timestamp,
		{Last Name} as string,
		{Middle Name} as string,
		Name as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Date of Birth} as date,
		{Country of Residence} as string,
		Nationality as string,
		{Passport No} as string,
		{Expiration date} as string,
		{Visa Required} as string,
		{Do you have visa?} as string,
		{Ill be applying for my visa in? (Country)} as string,
		{Ill be applying for my visa in? (City)} as string,
		{Do you have any appointment yet?} as string,
		Visa as string,
		{Copy of Passport/UNLP} as string,
		{Division/Section} as string,
		{Organization / Company name} as string,
		{Job Title} as string,
		{Type Of Employee} as string,
		{Type of Organization} as string,
		{Sub-type of organization} as string,
		Size as string,
		{BSO ownership} as string,
		{Company Address} as string,
		City as string,
		{Post Code} as string,
		Country as string,
		Region as string,
		{Company visit Water Treatment Plant} as string,
		{Company visit Garden Ltd} as string,
		{Tourism package} as string,
		{Primary Contact Person} as string,
		{Primary Phone No} as string,
		{Primary E-mail} as string,
		{Secondary Contact Person} as string,
		{Secondary Phone No} as string,
		{Secondary E-mail} as string,
		Picture as string,
		Biography as string,
		Website as string,
		Twitter as string,
		LinkedIn as string,
		{Departure City} as string,
		{Preferred Date of Arrival} as string,
		{Preferred Date of Departure} as string,
		{Arrival Flight Date} as string,
		{Arrival Flight Time} as string,
		{Inbound Flight No} as string,
		{Return Flight Date} as string,
		{Return Flight Time} as string,
		{Return Flight No} as string,
		Hotel as string,
		{Total Cost in US$} as string,
		{Travel Request No} as string,
		{World Export Development Forum} as string,
		{SheTrades Global} as string,
		{YES Forum} as string,
		{Do you want to Participate in B2Bs} as string,
		{Do you want to Participate in Company Visits / Tourism Packages} as string,
		{Ticket Upload} as string,
		{Confirmed Registration} as string,
		{Approved Date} as string,
		{Badge Tag} as string,
		{Pre-Print} as string,
		{Badge Printed} as string,
		{Badge Printed on} as string,
		{Printed By (name)} as string,
		{Badge Activated} as string,
		{Badge Activated on} as string,
		{Activated By} as string,
		{Activation Version} as string,
		{T&C} as string,
		Val as string,
		Age as string,
		{Age Rounded} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
